question: Write a professional email apologizing to a client for missing a project deadline. The delay was due to unexpected technical issues on our end.
response:
Subject: Sincere Apology and Explanation for Delay

Dear [Client's Name],  

I am writing to express my sincerest apologies for the missed project deadline. I fully understand the frustration and concern this delay may have caused, and I regret the inconvenience.

The delay was entirely on our end, due to unexpected technical issues that we were not foreseen. We are taking immediate steps to resolve these technical issues and ensure that we are fully back on track.

We are committed to making this right and are working diligently to meet the new deadline. We will keep you posted on our progress and your satisfaction is our top priority.

Once again, I am deeply sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

With respect,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Company Name]

Client's Name: [Client's Name],

Date: [Date]  

Subject: [Subject]  

Hi [Client's Name],  

I’m sorry to inform you of a slight delay in the completion of the [Project Title]. It’s my understanding that the deadline was due on [Date], but, due to unexpected technical issues on our end, we’ve been unable to deliver the work earlier.  

After a quick review, we've identified the root cause of the delay and have taken immediate steps to resolve it. We're working to complete the project as quickly as possible and anticipate that it can be handed back to you by [New Date].  

While I understand the inconvenience this may have caused, I truly apologize for the lack of communication on our part. I’m committed to ensuring that we meet our obligations and maintain the highest standard of reliability in our work.  

I would really appreciate the opportunity to discuss this matter further with you at your earliest convenience. Please let me know a time that suits you best, and I'll be happy to speak to you directly.  

Thank you for your patience and understanding. I hope this information is clear and helpful. I remain committed to providing the best possible support and service for your project.  

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]
